title: Caramelised spiced pumpkin seeds
ingredients: ['3 tablespoons caster sugar', '1/4 teaspoon cumin', '1/4 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1/4 teaspoon ground ginger', '1 pinch cayenne pepper', '130g raw whole pumpkin seeds, washed and dried', 'cooking spray or oil for greasing', '2 teaspoons salt or to taste', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '2 tablespoons caster sugar']
